content:
Toggl integrates with many popular project management tools, including Asana and Trello!

**Toggl Integrations:**

Toggl has a wide range of integrations with popular project management tools, including:

1. **Asana:** Toggl integrates with Asana, allowing you to track time spent on tasks and projects directly from within Asana.
2. **Trello:** Toggl integrates with Trello, enabling you to track time spent on cards and boards.
3. **Basecamp:** Toggl integrates with Basecamp, allowing you to track time spent on projects and tasks.
4. **Jira:** Toggl integrates with Jira, enabling you to track time spent on issues and projects.
5. **GitHub:** Toggl integrates with GitHub, allowing you to track time spent on commits and pull requests.

These integrations enable you to track time spent on tasks and projects across multiple platforms, providing a more comprehensive view of your time usage.

**How Toggl Integrates with Asana:**

With the Toggl-Asana integration, you can:

1. **Track time spent on tasks:** Track time spent on Asana tasks and projects directly from within Asana.
2. **Automatically log time:** Toggl can automatically log time spent on Asana tasks, eliminating the need for manual time tracking.
3. **View time reports:** View detailed time reports within Asana, providing insights into how you're spending your time.

To set up the integration, you'll need to connect your Asana account to Toggl through the Toggl dashboard. Once connected, you can start tracking time spent on Asana tasks and projects seamlessly.

This integration will save you time and effort, and provide a more accurate picture of how you're spending your time on your project with the Tokyo-based startup.

Give it a try, and I'm sure you'll love the seamless integration!
